Detailed Description

Interface class for the BlackBoxNode for easier testing.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool blackbox_control::IBlackBoxNode::export_ ( Export::Request &  req,
Export::Response &  res 
)
pure virtual

Exports a selected range of recordings.

Parameters
reqThe request, that contains two fields:
int32 begin - The beginning timestamp, from which the export should start, int32 end - The end timestamp, after which no data should be exported.
resThe response, that contains one field:
string file_name - The filename of the exported data.
The filename is generated automatically based on the current time.

Implemented in blackbox_control::BlackBoxNode.

virtual bool blackbox_control::IBlackBoxNode::getAvailableRange_ ( GetAvailableRange::Request &  req,
GetAvailableRange::Response &  res 
)
pure virtual

Returns the smallest and largest timestamp available in the storage.

Parameters
req- The request - not used
res- The response, that contains two fields:
string begin - The smallest timestamp
string end - The largest timestamp

Implemented in blackbox_control::BlackBoxNode.

virtual bool blackbox_control::IBlackBoxNode::playback_ ( Playback::Request &  req,
Playback::Response &  res 
)
pure virtual

Starts or stops the playback of already recorded data.

Parameters
reqThe request, that contains two fields:
bool play - if true, the playback starts, if false, it is stopped
int32 pos - selects the datetime to start from using a Unix timestamp
resThe response to be sent after executing the request - Empty.

Implemented in blackbox_control::BlackBoxNode.
